column4: guys help. How do I tell grub to boot an ubuntu installation from usb?
How do I tell grub to boot an ubuntu installation from usb?
is that a command to execute?
the usb doesn't have a boot folder though... it has a isolinux one and many others
you don't need a boot folder
do you use grub1 oder grub2?
I believe I have version 1.99 is that possible?
